remarks: A version of Russell's paradox ~ ru (see also ~ bj-ru ).  Note the more economical use of ~ bj-abeq2 instead of ~ abeq2 to avoid dependency on ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by BJ, 12-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-ru1 $p |- -. E. y y = { x | -. x e. x } $.
$d x y $.
